src:
Solskjaer: MU Beruntung Bisa Bermain di Liga Europa
07 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer tidak menganggap bermain di Liga Europa sebuah kerugian untuk timnya. Solskjaer menilai timnya cukup beruntung karena mereka bisa mengembangkan tim mereka di kompetisi ini.
Musim lalu, Manchester United mengakhiri musim dengan mengecewakan. Mereka hanya finish di peringkat enam klasemen akhir EPL sehingga mereka hanya mendapatkan tiket ke Liga Europa.
Banyak pihak menilai bahwa United rugi besar bermain di Liga Europa. Selain karena kompetisi itu tidak terlalu bergengsi, kompetisi ini juga memiliki jadwal yang mepet dengan pertandingan Liga sehingga itu bakal menjadi beban bagi skuat United.
Namun Solskjaer menilai bahwa dengan adanya Liga Europa, ia bisa mengembangkan timnya dengan baik. "Musim ini kami memberikan kesempatan kepada para pemain muda kami di kompetisi ini dan mereka bermain dengan baik," buka Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Solskjaer: MU Lucky Can Play in the Europa League
Nov 7 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer does not consider playing in the Europa League a loss for his team. Solskjaer assessed his team was quite lucky because they could develop their team in this competition.
Last season, Manchester United ended the season disappointingly. They only finished sixth in the final EPL standings so they only got tickets to the Europa League.
Many people consider that United suffered a great loss in the Europa League. Apart from the fact that the competition is not very prestigious, this competition also has a tight schedule with league matches so that it will become a burden for United's squad.
But Solskjaer considers that with the Europa League, he can develop his team well. "This season we gave our young players an opportunity in this competition and they played well," Solskjaer told MUTV.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
